@954px So it would not be as smooth / fluid / as good of sound quality for any songs that aren't Kanye/stems on release for the stem player. As it's harder for software to split songs into stems without having the master recordings I'd imagine. It looks cool though as a concept.

@954px That's for his songs, the stem player uses some software on a backend server to split songs into stems if they aren't already stems. So what I mean is that any of Kanye songs will come as stems already and be made that way, while other mp3s from other artists would not be.

@954px Idk man. For files / songs that aren't from Kanye / his team it wont be able to separate the layers (vocals etc) as well as songs that come from him / his team that can be separated properly as made to be from the start. But you know i'm a skeptic of everything.

@NFTWizart @Don_Kingy @johnnygx_ @tonyberlusconi @alemsah @opensea @coolcatsnft @doodles @poetslost @RTFKTstudios @Deadfellaz @creatureNFT @KarafuruNft @AnimoNFT @psychedelic_nft @robotosNFT But one thing that doesn't add up with the SetApprovalForAll theory is that the WETH from the sales were transferred to 4 different addresses directly from victims wallet implying they have full control of it. SetApprovalForAll is for ERC721 and not ERC20 WETH.

@NFTWizart @Don_Kingy @johnnygx_ @tonyberlusconi @alemsah @opensea @coolcatsnft @doodles @poetslost @RTFKTstudios @Deadfellaz @creatureNFT @KarafuruNft @AnimoNFT @psychedelic_nft @robotosNFT yes it would give 0xad069f245e0c547aa6bfb9e0e288756634365841 access to transfer / approve tokens so they could do anything.

Theoretically we wouldnt see on chain tx's to initiate sell orders because opensea orders are offchain.

@Don_Kingy @NFTWizart @johnnygx_ @tonyberlusconi @alemsah @opensea @coolcatsnft @doodles @poetslost @RTFKTstudios @Deadfellaz @creatureNFT @KarafuruNft @AnimoNFT @psychedelic_nft @robotosNFT I looked into this a bit this morning, it looks like RareBunniClub could have rugged him but im not sure they did. This looks like a key compromise more.

The sales all happened on opensea directly, SetApprovalForAll just allows the Approved address transfer ALL tokens.
